channel.title: LearningRs on Under The Hood
channel.description: Recent content in LearningRs on Under The Hood

item.title: Learning R
item.description: So you wanna learn R? Ways to learn R Complete courses to learn R in a structured curriculum. Undertake a data project using R. An in-the-browser tutorial for getting to know the R language - no software installation needed: http://tryr.codeschool.com Introductory course to R, from Data Camp: www.datacamp.com/courses/free-introduction-to-r ‘R for Data Science’, by Garrett Grolemund & Hadley Wickham: http://r4ds.had.co.nz/ (also available in hard copy if you prefer)
